RelatedSentence: A Durham Police spokesman said : A formal identification has now been carried out on the body of a young man found in the River Wear yesterday morning .
The procedure confirmed the body was that of Luke Pearce , aged 19 who had been missing since last Sunday , 11th May .
But police were called to the river on Sunday morning by members of Durham Amateur Rowing Club after they spotted someone in the water near to Bath 's Bridge in Durham City , at just before 8.45 am .
